post.body: congratz to him! Love the show btw.
chilly in TX starting tomorrow it seems
wow, keep them coming. Thanks!
yeah, never been a fan of secret santa. I want a game, i buy it.
can't wait to get my copy in the mail. I'm a little disappointed with the 'rules issues' all over BGG and CSW.
@craftybeans that reminds me that I need to download some of those... unfort. working a 24hr shift... I'll forget by tomorrow
looking forward to it!!
no, no Dominion last night... i need to get more sleeves for it :)
if you din't like it, sell it before it drops in price! http://snipurl.com/7s6zo
done... thanks for the heads up. Oh and T+E... yes, it's gathering dust on my book case
The Aquarium on Kemah has lost some of its 'luster' after hurr Ike. The Kemah Boardwalk 'feels' depressing overall.
Vassal is making a comeback in my life... played some Hannibal last night with a friend from San Antonio. Tomorrow may include some CC:E
merry christmas to all!
D&D 4th ed looks like what i wanted Descent to be. Maybe someday I'll try.
omw to visit family im SA, TX. Maybe some Hannibal and CC with gaming bud
All of next week off... SWEEEET. Family will be over though. Time for Apples to Apples, Say Anything, Liar's Dice, etc...
chabuca's? nah, I'll pass. I'll stick to Fogo di ciao or Texas de Brazil. @martang I'm Jaded.
we'll see if Chabuca's is as good as Dallas' Texas de Brazil...
enjoying a Shiner Bock... best bock ever
"Thank the gods for BSW" -Rob the cylon, in between actual work...
